message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60 and you get 40. This way we both walk away with something.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the money loses value faster for you.
Bob, my offer is more than fair considering the inflation. Let's close this deal and avoid further losses.
Inflation is hitting you harder, I'm willing to take a bit more to compensate for my own losses.
Bob, let's be real. This back and forth is only hurting both of us. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now before we lose even more to inflation.
